title: Toyota Bangladesh to reshape new car driving experience
body: Going forward, the company aims to achieve sustained growth in any business environment and remains committed to fostering teamwork while striving to fulfill its mission Premmit Singh, managing director of Toyota Bangladesh Limited, stated that in line with Toyota’s Global Vision “Be the Right ONE,” and as an integral part of the Toyota worldwide network, the company’s mission is to continually address the ever-changing needs of car enthusiasts. Accordingly, Toyota Bangladesh Limited will offer unprecedented added value to contribute to the creation of an enriched society in Bangladesh, where car owners’ passion for their vehicles is truly valued. Going forward, the company aims to achieve sustained growth in any business environment and remains committed to fostering teamwork while striving to fulfill its mission. At the same time, every effort will be made to “Be the Right ONE” for Bangladeshi car owners. What drives Toyota’s continued growth in a changing world is the core DNA developed by its group companies over many years of experience: “Live on site, face reality, and accomplish.” Stay tuned as they bring you exciting news in the near future. This showroom launch is just the tip of the iceberg. Showroom address: Trade Intercontinental, 213/A, Bir Uttam Mir Shawkat Sarak, Tejgaon, Dhaka.
